title: Arrive in Mumbai & Check-in
description: Arrive at Mumbai airport and check into Hotel Bawa Continental. Use local trains and auto rickshaws for transportation. Explore local markets and dine at a nearby restaurant in the evening.

title: Karka Sankranti
description: Visit local temples celebrating Karka Sankranti. Use local trains for transportation. Enjoy dinner at a local restaurant.

title: Art of India Exhibition
description: Visit the "Art of India: A Collection" exhibition at the Jehangir Art Gallery.

title: Festival of Dance
description: Attend the Festival of Dance at the NCPA. Use Uber for transportation. Enjoy dinner at a nearby restaurant.
location: National Centre for the Performing Arts (NCPA), Mumbai

title: Cultural Festival at Shivaji Park
description: Visit the Cultural Festival at Shivaji Park. Enjoy food and art.

title: Pre-celebration of Sawan Shivratri
description: Visit temples and experience rituals throughout the day. Enjoy dinner at a local restaurant in the evening.

title: Second Sawan Somwar
description: Visit Shiva temples for rituals and prayers. Use auto rickshaws for shorter trips.

title: Sawan Pradosh Vrat
description: Attend Sawan Pradosh Vrat rituals at popular temples like Siddhivinayak and Mahalaxmi Temple. Return to accommodation and pack for departure.
location: Siddhivinayak Temple and Mahalaxmi Temple, Mumbai
